sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct n.name as source_id, n.name ||'.gif' as image_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, n.description as description, nc.name as ext_source, count(distinct nn.network_node_id) as node_count FROM Apidb.NetworkContext nc, ApiDB.Network n, ApiDB.NetworkNode nn, ApiDB.NetworkRelationship nr, ApiDB.NetworkRelContextLink nrcl, ApiDB.NetworkRelContext nrc WHERE nrcl.network_id = n.network_id AND nrcl.network_rel_context_id = nrc.network_rel_context_id AND nrc.network_context_id = nc.network_context_id AND nrc.network_relationship_id = nr.network_relationship_id AND (nr.associated_node_id = nn.network_node_id OR nr.node_id = nn.network_node_id) GROUP BY nc.name, n.name, n.description
